---
description: 'How to send mint an NFT collection using another NFT as the Issuer'
image: /img/logo/iota_mark_light.png
tags:
  - how to
  - collection
  - issuer
  - nft
  - nodejs
  - python

import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';

# Mint an NFT Collection

## Example Code

<Tabs groupId="language" queryString>
<TabItem value="rust" label="Rust">

1. Get the `issuer_nft_id` from the provided arguments. If you haven't done so already, you should [create an issuer NFT](mint-issuer-nft.mdx).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/nft_collection/01_mint_collection_nft.rs#L44-L47
```

</div>

2. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
3. Create a new [`Bech32Address`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/types/block/address/struct.Bech32Address.html)
    passing the human-readable part (hrp) of the wallet address, and a new [`NftAddress`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/types/block/address/struct.NftAddress.html)
    created from the `issuer_nft_id`.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/nft_collection/01_mint_collection_nft.rs#L62-L63
```

</div>

4. Create the [`MintNftParams`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/struct.MintNftParams.html)
    for `NFT_COLLECTION_SIZE` NFTs adding immutable metadata by chaining a call to
    [`MintNftParams.with_immutable_metadata()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/struct.MintNftParams.html#method.with_immutable_metadata)
    and setting the address from step 3 as the issuer by chaining a call
    [`MintNftParams.with_issuer()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/struct.MintNftParams.html#method.with_issuer).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/nft_collection/01_mint_collection_nft.rs#L66-L73
```

</div>

5. Mint all the `nft_mint_params` by calling the [`Wallet.mint_nfts()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html#method.mint_nfts) function,
    waiting for the transaction to be accepted by the network by calling the [`Wallet.wait_for_transaction_acceptance()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html#method.wait_for_transaction_acceptance) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/nft_collection/01_mint_collection_nft.rs#L75-L87
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="typescript-node" label="Typescript (Node.js)">

The following example will:

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Wallet) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
2. Get the `issuerNftId` from the provided arguments. If you haven't done so already, you should [create an issuer NFT](mint-issuer-nft.mdx).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/nft_collection/01_mint_collection_nft.ts#L55
```

</div>

3. Create a new [`Bech32Address`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/api_ref/#bech32address)
    passing the human-readable part (hrp) of the client, and a new [`NftAddress`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/NftAddress/)
    created from the `issuer_nft_id`.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/nft_collection/01_mint_collection_nft.ts#L57-L62
```

</div>

4. Create the [`MintNftParams`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/interfaces/MintNftParams/)
    for `NFT_COLLECTION_SIZE` NFTs adding immutable metadata by chaining a setting the
    [`MintNftParams.immutableMetadata()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/interfaces/MintNftParams/#immutablemetadata)
    property and setting the address from step 3 as the [issuer](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/interfaces/MintNftParams/#issuer).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/nft_collection/01_mint_collection_nft.ts#L66-L73
```

</div>

5. Mint all the `nftMintParams` by calling the [`Wallet.mintNfts()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Wallet/#mintnfts) function,
waiting for the transaction to be accepted by the network by calling the [`Wallet.waitForTransactionAcceptance()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Wallet/#waitfortransactionacceptance) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/nft_collection/01_mint_collection_nft.ts#L74-L101
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python" label="Python">

The following example will:
1. Get the `issuer_nft_id` from the provided arguments. If you haven't done so already, you should [create an issuer NFT](mint-issuer-nft.mdx).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/nft_collection/01_mint_collection_nft.py#L19
```

</div>

2. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
3. Create a new `Bech32Address` passing the human-readable part (hrp) of the client, and a new [`NFTAddress`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/NftAddress/)
    created from the `issuer_nft_id`.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/nfts/send_nft.py#L20-L23
```

</div>

4. Create the [`MintNftParams`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/types/send_params/#mintnftparams-objects)
    for `NFT_COLLECTION_SIZE` NFTs adding immutable metadata by chaining a setting the
    [`Irc27Metadata`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/types/irc_27/)
    property and setting the address from step 3 as the [issuer](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/interfaces/MintNftParams/#issuer).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/nft_collection/01_mint_collection_nft.py#L35-L55
```

</div>

5. Mint all the `nft_mint_params` by calling the [`Wallet.mint_nfts()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/#mint_nfts) function,
waiting for the transaction to be accepted by the network by calling the [`Wallet.wait_for_transaction_acceptance()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/#wait_for_transaction_acceptance) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/nft_collection/01_mint_collection_nft.py#L57-L74
```

</div>
</TabItem>
</Tabs>
